reasoning: Aggregate BOTEC estimate of rib abnormalities as umbrella term encompassing: accessory ribs (~500/100k), cervical ribs (~500/100k), fused ribs (~200/100k), bifid ribs (~100/100k), short ribs (~100/100k), other rib dysplasias (~600/100k).
